entry.title: nhanlethanh1198/distid: A lightweight, distributed ID generator designed for large-scale systems. DistId generates unique 64-bit IDs with built-in timestamp, node identifier, and counter, making it ideal for distributed environments where collision resistance and indexing performance are critical.
